item.title: On F-pure thresholds and quasi-F-purity of hypersurfaces
item.description: arXiv:2509.06211v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We show that quasi-$F$-pure but not $F$-pure isolated quasi-homogeneous hypersurface singularities necessarily have $F$-pure threshold $1 - \frac{1}{p}$. This extends work of Bhatt and Singh beyond the Calabi-Yau case. We also classify the (quasi)-$F$-purity of Fermat hypersurfaces.
item.dc:creator: Jack J Garzella, Vignesh Jagathese
